thread.title: Rayo coach Paco Jémez linked with Spain national team job again
thread.title_full: Rayo coach Paco Jémez linked with Spain national team job again

title: Rayo coach Paco Jémez linked with Spain national team job again
text:
Source: Football Espana Date: 19-10-2015 Time: 07:10:01:pm 
Rayo Vallecano Coach Paco Jemez has further discussed links to the Spain job but noted that he’s been linked with a lot of roles lately. 
AS readers voted Jemez their favoured candidate to replace the retiring Vicente Del Bosque after Euro 2016 and Jemez himself admitted he’d find the post ‘hard to turn down,’ and in an interview with El Laguero, took a tongue-in-cheek approach. 
“What, I’ve become fashionable? It’s nice to know that many people prefer me for such an important job,” he admitted, AS reports. 
“But the Barca B team is better than Rayo. And the Coach of the Barca B team is better than me. 
“I’m the Coach of Rayo, a small team but one that satisfies me a lot, so I’m here. But my path and Rayo’s path will not always be together. 
“Whenever there’s a problem on any bench my name is called out and I’ve been at Rayo four years. There are several teams I’d like to train. Coaches want to improve, who wouldn’t like to train a big team?” 
-
